name: Catpetition
description:
Compete with second real player to beat angry chicken!

Game is a co-op platformer, where you have to cooperate with you teammate to defend angry chicken.

This game is entry for Slavic Game Jam 2018.

Developed by: Konrad Klocek, Hubert Zajma, Jakub Zajma.

Special thanks to Elie Abraham for composing great music :3.
